1.content: Who's going to be transformed?
1.title: Choose a character

11.content: What does Betty change into?
11.title: The main character deserves a change!

1111.content:
Betty Barrett was volunteering at the local animal shelter. She was helping look after the dogs at the shelter and was in her element. She had always loved animals (though never to the same degree as Paloma did) and whenever possible, she would help out at the shelter or her grandmother’s farm.

“What kind of heartless person would abandon or abuse such beautiful creatures?” Betty thought to herself as a Dalmatian; a Labrador Retriever; an Old English Sheepdog; a Great Dane; an English Pointer; and an American Foxhound began licking her face. “After all, they’re so lovable!”

Unbeknownst to Betty as she stroked and petted the dogs, she was starting to turn into a dog herself.
1111.title: Dog

11113.content:
Betty felt some strange feeling rumble in her belly, it traveled up her windpipe and out her mouth and came out as a..."Woof!"

Betty covered her mouth with shock "Oh my goodness!" She exclaimed "Did I just bark like a dog?!"

Betty suddenly realized she was getting smaller and smaller as the dogs kept licking her face. She felt something poking out her rear end, she looked down and saw a small tail (It didn't have any fur on it yet) pop out of her backside and start to wag furiously

As the dogs kept licking her, Betty suddenly felt a strange sense of peacefulness flow through her being. She had a strange feeling that turning into a dog was the most natural thing she had ever done.

As she was shrinking, she lifted her hand to her face she felt fuzzy fur on her cheeks

It was clear she was turning into a small dog...But what kind?
11113.title: She starts to bark

11213112.content:
Betty was trying to get Purrsy off her back, but he wouldn't let go. He just kept pounding her, intent on delivering a new pack of kittens into the world. As each pound occurred, Betty's mind slowly began to change. She had memories of her old life, but she was beginning to develop a new feeling of love for Purrsy. A big, strong cat like that would be the ideal mate to raise kittens with. Just then, Betty felt Purrsy tense up- it was the climax!

Following that, the two lay still for a moment. "I'm sorry for jumping you like that, ma'am, but I was a little... excited" said Purrsy.

Betty just giggled and said "Oh, it's no trouble at all... Purrsy".

"Betty!?" said Purrsy, shock evident in his voice. Oh, boy- was he in trouble when his mistress found out he had impregnated her daughter. Of course, it would be a really tough story to explain... "So, how did you become a cat?" said Purrsy.

"Well, it's a long story..." Betty began.

choices: Her hair turns into a mane
1142.content:
It was a crisp Saturday morning and Betty thought it might be nice to go for a jog. So after a quick breakfast she said goodbye to her parents and and set out for a quick trot around the block.

Along the way, she saw a young man riding bareback on a beautiful white mare.

"Oh what a beautiful horse you have!" Betty said admiringly

"Why thank you!" The young man said graciously "She's a purebred Andalusian!"

Betty was so entranced by the horse that she failed to notice that she was effortlessly keeping up with the horse despite the fact that the horse was galloping at full speed.

But strangely Betty didn't feel any strain on her body, she just felt like she was floating, her feet only occasionally touching the ground

What happens next?
1142.title: The Beauty of the Beast

choices: Betty loses her ability to speak
11421.content:
Had Betty looked down at her feet, she would have seen them becoming hooves. First her toes became rigid and inflexible, then they began to fuse together to form a bony mass. The lack of nerve tissue meant Betty was unable to physically feel her newly-formed hooves, hence the floating sensation she was experiencing. With her feet turned into hooves, her legs also began to change, becoming longer; more powerful; and more equine in shape, before growing a coat of white horse hair, which also covered her now-equine buttocks.

All the while, Betty remained oblivious to the changes, such was her fixation on the Andalusian mare.
11421.title: Her feet turn to hooves

choices: Betty loses her ability to speak and begins to neigh
114211.content:
As Betty continued to gallop alongside the gorgeous Andalusian mare, she couldn't help but notice an unusual sensation in the base of her spine. It felt as though it was elongating, which was, in fact, exactly what was happening. Long greyish-silver hairs grew rapidly from her new appendage as it lengthened, until she sported a full-blown horse tail.

Upon realising that she now had the tail of a horse, Betty should have been horrified. Instead (and much to her surprise), she felt perfectly OK with it. There was nothing wrong with having a tail - on the contrary, it felt natural, it felt right. She didn't even care about not wearing a skirt or any underwear, both of which had long since been destroyed by her massive equine rump.

As she subconsciously swished her tail from side to side, Betty felt a warm, fuzzy sensation as coarse white hairs started to grow all over her rear. They spread rapidly across her flank and down her legs, until they were completely covered in white horse hair. At the same time, her ears became long and triangular, moving to the top of her head before being coated in white fur.
114211.title: Betty grows a tail

choices: Trot over to the young man, who gives her some carrots
1142112.content:
As she trotted alongside the strange man and his magnificent Andalusian mare, Betty found herself becoming more and more like a horse as the changes assaulting her body continued unabated. Her hands suffered the same fate as her feet, her fingers becoming rigid and losing all sensation before fusing together to form her new front hooves. At the same time, her arms became longer, more powerful, more equine in appearance, as they morphed into a horse’s forelegs. White horse hair erupted up her back, spreading down her new forelegs and across her chest, which seemed to expand more and more with every breath she took. Her fledgling breasts slowly retreated into her torso, only to be replaced by a horse’s udder situated near her crotch, her vagina having relocated to a position better suited to an equine. The changes, together with the resultant weight gain, were making it increasingly difficult to walk on two legs and as a result, her earlier gallop had been reduced to a mere trot.

In addition, Betty noticed that the changes were not just affecting her body; they were affecting her mind too. Her thoughts were getting hazy. It was getting hard to think. As she trotted past a road sign, she found that she could no longer comprehend written words; the letters and numerals seemed totally alien to her diminishing equine intellect. Even the words spoken by the human male riding alongside her sounded like complete gibberish to her.

Strangely, Betty did not feel in the slightest bit scared or upset by what was happening to her; on the contrary, she thoroughly enjoyed it. She wanted to be a horse, in body as well as mind. No, she didn’t just want it, she needed it! She was always meant to be a horse and now, at last, she could. A part of her knew she should be frightened by the changes assailing her body and mind, horrified even. Indeed, she probably would have been, had it not been for the wonderful mare trotting gently alongside her. Betty felt an intense emotional bond form between her and the horse, but couldn’t figure out what it was. It was as though the mare was her mother and she, Betty, was her foal, but that couldn’t possibly be right… could it?

After a while, Betty and the strange man stopped at the side of the road for a quick rest and a bite to eat. Unable to maintain her bipedal stance any longer, Betty finally fell onto all fours, her pelvis shifting as her front hooves hit the ground, locking her in her new quadrupedal form forever more.

“Mmm… much better,” she thought to herself, smiling as her lips began to change, becoming thick, dark and leathery, just like those of a real horse. Well, she was a real horse, wasn’t she? Why would her body be covered in horse hair if she wasn’t a horse?

Now on all fours like the animal she was soon to be, Betty slowly trotted back and forth as she tried to get the hang of her new legs. Once she’d gotten accustomed to walking on four legs, which didn’t take terribly long, she then proceeded to…
1142112.title: Betty undergoes mental changes

12.content: OK then, let's set scene. Pick a scenario!
12.title: Paloma

122.content:
It was a warm spring day and Paloma had volunteered to help out on Beatrixo's farm. She was busying herself with milking the cows and was very much in her element - as a shapeshifter with the ability to morph into any living creature, she loved animals and could empathise with them.

"It's OK, Mavis," the raven-haired alien girl said softly to the cow she was milking, "Just relax as your Tía Paloma rids you of all that excess milk!"

Mavis let out a long moo, which Paloma understood to mean "I know, my dear. You're such a kind girl!"

Paloma smiled in response and continued milking, her beautiful brown eyes half-closed as the rhythmic motion of her hands tugging on Mavis' nipples proved almost hypnotic to her. In fact, Paloma was so engrossed in her activity that she quite failed to notice that she was slowy beginning to transform into a cow!
122.title: Paloma is helping out on Beatrixo's farm

choices: A true wild night happened for Lee as Sarah did her best...
They hugged but Sarah excused herself and went home...

1543.content:
Penelope knew Sarah from their meeting in second grade. They were good friends right off and stayed that way, all the years through high school. However something occurred that caused their friendship to part their ways, and that was when Penelope became mixed up with another girl. Sharon took the place of Sarah as if she and Penelope were best of friends.

Sarah tended to dislike Sharon the first time she met her, when Penelope did the introductions. Something of a snide nature about Sharon bothered Sarah, and even though she tried hard to please Penelope, there began a rift between two friends.

Sarah and Penelope attended the same local junior college, but met only rarely during the five day weeks. Sarah had plans to get her first two years of basic classes completed at their local college, and then transfer to Purdue University. Penelope thought to complete her graphic art degree at the community college, and then seek her fortune. Both friends were aggressive toward their studies, but Penelope having met Sharon began teaching Penelope to draw and paint vivid portrayed pictures of local people they both knew, but utilizing a face grafted into pictures of Anthropic animals.

Sarah went to give Penelope a birthday present, and while visiting her friend, Penelope proudly showed Sarah a painting done depicting her as if being in part a doe goat, having horns, ears, and instead of her nicely combed head of hair. was a ruddy mop of goat fur. Also in the painting stood a tall goat, supposedly a male, as if it and she were close friends. Naturally, Sarah asked if the girl in the painting were her, then what was the name of the goat. The reply of Penelope started Sarah, as she was informed the goat represented Lee Vaulthurst, a mutual friend. As Lee was a buddy to Kevin Rooste and they were friends with a crude minded fellow so named as AdobeFats.

Sarah stood there and eyed carefully the painting, denoting the background scene, a place she had gone with Lee often during the summer months to sunbathe and swim. The artwork about the goat was so vivid one looking at it might think it was a real photo. The detailing caused Sarah to get angry, pointing to the depiction of her friend Lee, and how he was shown standing upright, as on the hind legs, his male genital in clear view for all to see; especially a tweak of hot pink showing at the opening to his goat-buck sheath.

The two friends then argued and Sarah left there in a huff, feeling humiliated by Penelope.

When Sarah arrived home she called Lee using the home phone. His phone rang six times and Sarah expected the answering machine to click in and accept her message. Instead, Lee did answer his phone but how he spoke did not sound right to Sarah; his voice was squeaky and at the end of certain words she thought he did a short bleating sound.

Lee was in no mood for conversing and he was very abrupt with Sarah. The abrupt attitude was not the usual for Lee, and Sarah feeling worried, she put on her sweater and leaving her apartment, she walked a few houses east to the house Lee was gifted to him in his parents last will and testament.

Knocking at the front door, Sarah called for Lee to come open the front door.

Lee finally came to be on the inside of the door and asked Sarah to go home.

This made Sarah be stubborn and she kept at the knocking on the door.

Finally, after ten minutes of making noise and her knocking, Lee opened the door and let Sarah enter. She asked what was wrong with him, but he backed away from her and said nothing. She plagued him with her questions until he yelled for her to stop asking him why this and why, as he then bleated, making the common sound of a goat.

Sarah asked him if he was trying to be funny, and asked if he had seen the picture Penelope painted of him being a buck goat, standing aside her, and she as if changing to be a doe goat. To her surprise and somewhat to him, he said he had not see the painting, but had met Sharon, she asking him to come to her lakeside cottage and then asked he stay for a night.

Lee then began to cry. He felt upset but not directly due to hearing about the painting. His problem was that he did not service Penelope in the ways she wanted, and she said she would curse him to lusting for mating with dumb animals. He laughed at her, and she got furious with him, yelled at him using Latin words what made him stiffen to where he could not move, or run away.

Penelope then stripped him down to being butt naked. She told him his curse would be permanent, and that with her then painting his entire body with a smelly salve, he should go home and learn to enjoy being naked. Well, he drove home and after arriving, he showered and went to lie on his bed, he awoke late afternoon. What he found was his still naked body from having showered, his skin was a dark gray to in places as black. Where the skin was black, black fur had grown, covering his groin, thighs, buttocks and began a trail of fur along his spine to end at his shoulders.

Lee removed the bath towel he had around his waist, letting it drop to the floor. As he stood there Sarah saw his goat like genitals, and about two inches below his navel he had a black furred buck goat sheath with a tweak of hot pink penis beginning to protrude.

Sarah yelled "No!"

As did Lee yell back to Sarah, "Yes, and a "Please help me, lie with me before this makes an animal of me, and I begin to think about doe goats; and not kind persons like you!"

Sarah felt her heart skip a beat and she rushed at Lee to hug and comfort him...

154331.content:
"No Sharon, no...," was what ran in circles through the head and mind of Sarah. As if it were all so real, but it was just a dream, a wet, sexy dream!

Slowly Sarah awoke from hearing the hustle and bustle of everyday life of the living and working folks. As she opened her eyes she noted the bedroom as different than hers, and with a clearing look through weary, sleepy eyes she realized it was the bedroom of Lee Vaulthurst.

Lee, Lee she went to visit because he had sounded on the phone as very odd, maybe upset.

Oh yea, she went to visit Lee, but he was quite reluctant in opening his front door. Although he did, and when she entered what she saw was the work of Penelope. It was her doings, she wanted to get at Sarah by cursing Lee. She cursed him to wanting for mating with dumb goats. Lee crying told how Penelope had stripped him to being naked. She told him of her curse would be on him as permanent, and she painted his entire body with a acclimation salve so that after he arrived home and went to bed, her magic would be then obvious to him.

Lee told Sarah about what he found when he awoke late in the afternoon of yesterday. He was naked, but his skin was a dark gray changing to in some places as black. Where the blackened skin flourished black fur had grown, covering Lee from his navel to thighs, buttocks and began a trail of fur along his spine to end at the base of his neck. How she did stare at his very different genitals. Lee had a scrotum five to six times bigger than any boy she had ever seen as naked. He had grown a goaty sheath, it peaked through his fur about two inches below his navel.

She stared and her glaring look began arousing Lee, to where Sarah noticed at the open end to his black fur covered goat sheath, peaked out the pointed and not at all looking circumcised, his very pink penis beginning to arouse, bloat as it protruded. She recalled her hugging Lee, wanting to show her concern and of giving him some hope.

Lee was by then at least half to being an animal, he a male goat. As they hugged his pinkish red colored goat cock grew long and rose to stand between them, as Lee looked at his changed cock, taking to licking it before he thought to try and give a kiss to Sarah. The musky smell of his goat should have turned Sarah away, but the spell added to the curse on Lee enveloped Sarah as well.

Sarah knew enough about how curses work, they are each an episode in lives they touch. Episodes are turns in the river of life, they flow with the current, have whirlpools, and dead backwater where nothing moves. Sharon left as fast as she had arrived, but Sarah and Lee became as spellbound, engrossed each with the other.

As Sarah rolled over to face then sleeping Lee, she looked at him and felt sad, as so much of what was human the previous afternoon had gone and transformed him, as Lee looked almost fully formed to being a buck goat. Transform the ladies of Atomic Betty into animals. A few rules, though.
